LayoutCatalog.Name: 1. Cosmos Starter Layout
LayoutCatalog.Description: This layout is nearly the same used for the Cosmos WPS product website, and it is a good layout to learn Cosmos.  It uses Bootstrap with Material Design principles, and jQuery, and it contains a number of template pages to help you kick-start your website development.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 2. Blank Layout
LayoutCatalog.Description: This is a 'blank' template that can be used to help you create your own template. Within are comments and help information that explain how to build your template.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 3. Bootstrapt 5 Starter (OFFICIAL)
LayoutCatalog.Description: Quickly and easily get started with Bootstrap's compiled, production-ready files with this barebones example featuring some basic HTML and helpful links. Download all our examples to get started. Complete documentation on how to use Bootstrap can be found on the project website.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 4. California State Web Template
LayoutCatalog.Description: The State Web Template is an open source web template maintained by the Office of Digital Services within the Department of Technology. Our components are designed to enhance the user experience and help digital teams create attractive, consistent, and accessible digital products. The State Web Template will always be open source, collaborative and evolving.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 5. California Design System
LayoutCatalog.Description: The Design System makes it easy for state digital teams to build accessible, consistent, and performant services and products to meet Californiansâ€™ needs.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 6. Material Design for Bootstrap 5 by MDB
LayoutCatalog.Description: Carousel full cover starter template from Material Design. Documentation for how to use this theme can be found at GitHub.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 7. Material Design for Bootstrap 5 by MDB (Dark Theme)
LayoutCatalog.Description: Carousel full cover starter dark-theme template from Material Design. Documentation for how to use this theme can be found at GitHub.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 8. Bootstrap 5 Inspired by Material Design by Tim Material Kit 2
LayoutCatalog.Description: The most complex and innovative UI Kit Made by Creative Tim. This is a Free Bootstrap 5 UI Kit with a fresh, new design inspired by Google's Material Design 2. Documentation can be found on online.

LayoutCatalog.Name: 9. Clean Blog Layout
LayoutCatalog.Description: Clean Blog is a stylish, responsive blog theme for Bootstrap created by Start Bootstrap .

LayoutCatalog.Name: 10. Bootstrap 5 Tutorial by Traversy Media
LayoutCatalog.Description: An example Bootstrap 5 template built as part of a tutorial by Traversy Media that is on YouTube.
